summary: THE HEAT FROM THE 12 VOLT COFFEE MAKER DAMAGED THE CARPETING OF THE VEHICLE.  IT APPEARED THAT THE HEATING ELEMENT INSIDE THE PRODUCT LOOSENED AND CAUSED IT TO COME TO REST ON THE PRODUCTS PLASTIC BOTTOM LAYER WHICH SUBSEQUENTLY HEATED THE SURFACE THAT IT LAY UPON (VECTOR PRODUCTS, INC.).  *TS   *NLM
